title: Charger, ca. 1775
markings: Signed in ochre on back. Label: "Wm H Plummer & Co. Ltd. New York City/Antique Dept/Moustiers 1775"
provenance: Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw; 2008: acquired by Museum
creditline: Gift of Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw
description: Circular form with shaped rim decorated with green and ochre borders surrounding floral lambrequins; center decorated with green, blue-green, and ochre scene of figures in landscape within scrollwork border.

tombstone.epitaph: Charger, ca. 1775.Tin-glazed earthenware. Gift of Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw. 2008-40-8.
